item.title: D2L-51-语言的统计特征
item.description: 语言的统计特征 2022-03-08 Tags: #Zipf_Law n元语法 n-gram 我们将涉及一个、两个和三个变量的概率公式的模型分别称为 “一元语法”（unigram）、“二元语法”（bigram）和“三元语法”（trigram）模型. $$\begin{aligned} &P\left(x_{1}, x_{2}, x_{3}, x_{4}\right)=P\left(x_{4}\right) P\left(x_{3}\right) P\left(x_{2}\right) P\left(x_{1}\right) \ &P\left(x_{1}, x_{2}, x_{3}, x_{4}\right)=P\left(x_{4} \mid x_{3}\right) P\left(x_{3} \mid x_{2}\right) P\left(x_{2} \mid x_{1}\right) P\left(x_{1}\right) \ &P\left(x_{1}, x_{2}, x_{3}, x_{4}\right)=P\left(x_{4} \mid x_{2}, x_{3}\right)P\left(x_{3} \mid x_{1}, x_{2}\right) P\left(x_{2} \mid x_{1}\right) P\left(x_{1}\right) \end{aligned}$$
